DOC.brief_summary: A Randomized , Double-Blind , Placebo-Controlled , Study Adalimumab Administered Subcutaneous Injections Adult Chinese Rheumatoid Arthritis Subjects Treated Methotrexate
DOC.brief_title: Study Adalimumab Administered Subcutaneous Injections Adult Chinese Rheumatoid Arthritis Subjects Treated With Methotrexate
DOC.criteria: Meet ACR criterion diagnosis active RA screening baseline visit 6 swollen joint 9 tender joint . A history , current , acute inflammatory joint disease different origin RA ( e.g. , mixed connective tissue disease , seronegative spondyloarthropathy , psoriatic arthritis , Reiter 's syndrome , systemic lupus erythematosus arthritide onset prior age 16 year ) .
